channel.title: [317] adding drops
channel.description: in the tutorial section, there is a tutorial on how to do this but when it says search for [code]if(NPCID2 == 200)[/code] in the npchandler.java file, it doesn't turn up with any results in my npchandler, so if you could tell me how to add drops, and add rarity to drops plz explain how.
